metadata.description: Quality enforcement layer for code, text, and design. Detects and prevents generic AI-generated patterns. Works complementary with any learning resource (books, courses, Posit skills). Includes active detection scripts.

plugins.name: anti-slop
plugins.description: Meta-skill that coordinates all anti-slop domain skills. Auto-loads appropriate skill based on file type.

plugins.name: toolkit
plugins.description: Active detection and cleanup scripts. Automated slop scoring for text and R code files.

plugins.name: text
plugins.description: Comprehensive text quality coordinator. Three-layer system: (1) pattern removal, (2) Strunk's principles, (3) human voice. One invocation applies all layers automatically.

plugins.name: humanizer
plugins.description: Wikipedia's 24-pattern checklist for removing AI writing signatures. Adds personality and voice to text.

plugins.name: design
plugins.description: Visual design quality enforcement. Detects cookie-cutter layouts, generic gradients, and 'AI startup' aesthetic.

plugins.name: r
plugins.description: R code quality enforcement. Namespace qualification, explicit returns, no generic names (df, data, result).

plugins.name: python
plugins.description: Python code quality enforcement. Type hints, docstrings, PEP 8 compliance, pandas best practices.

plugins.name: quarto
plugins.description: Quarto/RMarkdown quality enforcement. Prevents generic research documents, ensures reproducibility.

plugins.name: julia
plugins.description: Julia code quality enforcement for scientific computing. Type stability and multiple dispatch.

plugins.name: cpp
plugins.description: C++ and Rcpp quality enforcement for performance-critical code. Memory safety and Rcpp best practices.
